name: ZOA: Zone Syx [DEMO]
description:
PROJECT Z.O.A: ZONE SYX

-DEMO VERSION-

The primordial deities of the past have returned to their homeworld after thousands of years. They discover that things back home have drastically changed for the worst. Once a divine world of endless potential now rests on the brink of destruction.  

Launch into the multi-dimensional world of Evoria. Full of ancient relics, precious metals, and elemental power beyond the ethers. Play as a band of fallen guardians on a pursuit to break a curse set upon them and their homeworld. Discover secrets, gather resources, conquer threats and master your power! Reestablish an advanced and mysterious ark as a base to deploy missions. Align with a small A.I. collective of explorers, architects, engineers, scientists, and archeologists. Gather resources for crafting, buildings, and upgrading. Do you have what it takes to save evoria from a deadly plague and its parasitic offspring? 

GAME DETAILS

  • Title: ZOA: ZONE SYX Demo
  • Genre: RPG/ Action/ Adventure/ Sci-fi/  Thriller
  • Ages: 8 and Up
  • Players: Single Player Campaign 
  • Platforms: Windows OS, Android OS (coming soon)
  • Engine: Atelier RGSS / RPGM MV 
  • Founder/Creator: J.D. Wright                                                                             

 GAME FEATURES

  • Travel a multi-dimensional world
  • Discover lost secrets, and hidden chambers
  • An epic storyline, and evolving characters
  • 3 Unlockable characters
  • Collect tons of loot, ancient relics, and rare treasures
  • Bend and master powerful elements
  • Defend the zones against hordes of enemies
  • Deploy on critical missions to save the planet
  • Expandable player inventory and equipment  
  • Crafting, building, and upgrading
  • Action Role-Playing Game/Action battle system (None turn-based! ) 

GAME CONTROLS

  • Move: Direction Keys
  • Action: Spacebar or Enter or Left-Click Mouse
  • Dash: Shift Button or Left-Click Mouse
  • Arsenal Menu: (Q) Button
  • Special Menu: (W) Button
  • Game Menu: (X) Button

 COMBAT CONTROLS

  • Arsenal : (A) Button
  • Special Move: (S) Button
  • Attack: (Z) Button
  • Defense: (D) Button
  • Charge Weapon: Hold (Z) Release

PROJECT GOALS

We aim to accomplish a solid foundation that will be here for generations to come. Our goal is to build a community that will represent what creative minds desire. We all have a role to play in this world as individuals and together, and if we don’t take care of our world the results will detrimental.  The morals of Z.O.A is about taking care of ourselves and the planet for the next generations.
